inclusion.criterion: Patients undergoing thrice weekly in-center conventional HD
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least 90 days since start of hemodialysis
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Absence of pulmonary edema / signs of fluid overload on physical exam
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Currently dialyzing at a DNa >=137 mEq/L
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Single session Kt/V >=1.3 each month for the past 2 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hypertensive, defined by a pre-dialysis BP of >140/90 or treatment with 1 or more antihypertensive agents
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No more than 1 skipped treatment and no more than 1 session per month shortened by >10
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prone to IDH, defined as IDH occurring in >10% of treatments in the past 3 months.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has V. cholerae in stool, but no fever or blood in stool.
